title: Episode 31 w/ E-40
itunes:title: Episode 31 w/ E-40
description:
N.O.R.E. and DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode the guys drink it up with the bay area and hip hop legend E-40! The champs chop it up about E-40's business ventures in wine and spirits, his early career and stories with 2Pac, Biggie, Too $hort and a lot more. --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
